{{Infobox evolution item |name = Key Stone |image = [[File:Key Stone.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Key Stone''. |price = 25000 {{Battlepoints}} |location =
*[[Key Stone#Shops|Shops]] }} ==Description== The '''Key Stone''' is a type of [[Evolution Items|Evolution Item]] that is first encountered in the [[Kalos]] Region. ==Uses== For one of the following Pokémons to be able to [[Mega Evolution|Mega Evolve]] you will need them to meet 2 requirements. You must have obtained their Mega Stone and they must have 100x their Base Attack {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Mega Evolution !! Mega Stone |- | [[File:Absol.png|40px]] Absol || [[File:Mega Absol.png|40px]] Mega Absol || [[File:Absolite.png|50px]] [[Absolite]] |- | [[File:Lucario.png|40px]] Lucario || [[File:Mega Lucario.png|40px]] Mega Lucario || [[File:Lucarionite.png|50px]] [[Lucarionite]] |- | [[File:Abomasnow.png|40px]] Abomasnow || [[File:Mega Abomasnow.png|40px]] Mega Abomasnow || [[File:Abomasite.png|50px]] [[Abomasite]] |- | [[File:Audino.png|40px]] Audino || [[File:Mega Audino.png|40px]] Mega Audino || [[File:Audinite.png|50px]] [[Audinite]] |} == Acquisition == {{ItemPrice/head‎|Evolution items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kalos: Locations & Items|Shalour City]]|25000 {{Battlepoints}}}} |} |}
